entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port Carling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:44 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High plus 5.

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 5.

entry.title: Saturday: Snow or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning in the morning then changing to rain showers in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
